document.full_text: the united states and ngo campaign groups wednesday said diplomatic shifts on highly- charged issues like religion and iran in the long-polarized u.n. human rights council could turn it into a more effective body.
document.title: frictions seen easing in troubled u.n. rights body
lines_and_colors: the united states and ngo campaign groups wednesday said diplomatic shifts on highly- charged issues like religion and iran in the long-polarized u.n. human rights council could turn it into a more effective body.
